title: Amada Anime Series: Super Mario Brothers
synopsis: The Super Mario Amada Series are a series of short Japanese fairy tales anime that is found and released only in Japan. The series are released in August 3, 1989 once again only in Japan; making it extremely rare to people not living in Japan.
related_anime: ["Luigi's Toy Adventure", 'Super Mario Brothers: Peach-hime Kyuushutsu Daisakusen!', 'Super Mario World: Mario to Yoshi no Bouken Land']
